title: Billie on OverHeated (Spotify Commentary)
lyrics:
We took the production from "Not My Responsibility" and made it into a beat, and then wrote "OverHeated", and it's really just about the same thing, y'know, why the fuck is it such a shock that I look like 
all of you
? And I think that that's the funny thing, is the internet... you know, you feel so powerful and... somehow invisible at the same time? But... everybody sees it. You say crazy stuff on the internet thinking "ah... nobody will see it". It's really just about the... insanity of... paparazzi, and articles, and comment sections, and Twitter!
